Hong Kong's top court overturns acquittal of human rights lawyerHong Kong's top court on Thursday overturned the acquittal of activist and human rights lawyer Chow Hang Tung of inciting others to join an unauthorised vigil to remember victims of China's 1989 Tiananmen Square crackdown. Thu, 25 Jan 2024 04:53:37 GMT 26UZROSLQRLRBLIYGS2C4UEQXA https://www.reuters.com/world/china/hong-kong-top-court-overturns-acquittal- human-rights-lawyer-2024-01-25/Jessie Pang, Edward Cho世界中国
Fortescue works to clear iron ore held in China as quarterly shipments riseFortescue will work with Chinese authorities to resolve the delays keeping some of its iron ore cargoes from clearing customs, a company official said on Thursday. Thu, 25 Jan 2024 04:43:33 GMT 4YXQ3SAVUJMQTAGDRXI3FOBXT4 https://www.reuters.com/markets/commodities/fortescue-works-clear-iron-ore-held-china-quarterly-shipments-rise-2024-01-25/Melanie Burton, Rishav Chatterjee市场商品
Apple smartphone shipments in China shrink 2.1% in fourth quarter - IDCApple's smartphone shipments in China shrank 2.1% in the final quarter of 2023 from the same period a year ago, but Apple rose to the number one spot in the market, data from research firm IDC showed on Thursday. Thu, 25 Jan 2024 04:24:00 GMT LCLQDEWX6BONVJJP3ZPJ4MWSCY https://www.reuters.com/technology/apple-smartphone-shipments-china-shrink-21-fourth-quarter-idc-2024-01-25/Reuters技术
Japan business leaders return to China seeking to bolster cooperationAn unusually large delegation of about 200 Japanese business leaders arrived in China this week to bolster economic relations in the first such visit in more than four years and in the face of geopolitical headwinds that have strained bilateral ties. Thu, 25 Jan 2024 03:48:11 GMT QLX3SX55OFN4LDGXAG33JMVDPE https://www.reuters.com/markets/asia/japan-business-leaders-return-china-seeking-bolster-cooperation-2024-01-25/Reuters市场亚洲市场
Tesla CEO Musk: Chinese EV firms will 'demolish' rivals without trade barriersTesla CEO Elon Musk said on Wednesday Chinese automakers will "demolish" global rivals without trade barriers, underscoring the heat the U.S. electric vehicle market leader faces from the likes of BYD, who are racing to expand worldwide. Thu, 25 Jan 2024 02:53:09 GMT YFPGECJL3RMAZFJP2MCB3Z7HCA https://www.reuters.com/business/autos-transportation/tesla-ceo-musk-chinese-ev-firms-will-demolish-rivals-without-trade-barriers-2024-01-25/Abhirup Roy商业汽车与交通
Taiwan president-elect says he hopes for continued firm US supportTaiwan president-elect Lai Ching-te said on Thursday he hopes that the United States can continue to firmly support Taiwan, as he met the first group of U.S. lawmakers to visit Taipei since he won an election earlier this month. Thu, 25 Jan 2024 02:49:54 GMT RV2GV22CAZJNVIKBEX6H5RZ2HA https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/taiwan-president-elect-says-he-hopes-continued-firm-us-support-2024-01-25/Reuters世界亚太地区
